name: Grangers Wash+Repel Clothing 2 in 1 300ml
description: This wash-in formula delivers effective cleaning, and restores durable water-repellency, in a single wash and dry cycle.Cleans all technical outdoor fabrics and clothing including GORE-TEX®, eVent®.Restores water-repellent finishes.Heat activated in 30°C water and a low temperature tumble drier.
